mapper.insert: insert into odc.reviewLike (program_progSeq, user_userNumber, likedUser_userNumber) values (#{program_progSeq}, #{user_userNumber}, #{likedUser_userNumber})
mapper.select: select * from odc.reviewLike where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber} and likedUser_userNumber = #{likedUser_userNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from odc.reviewLike where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber} and likedUser_userNumber = #{likedUser_userNumber}
